searchDocs.title: Specs Implementation​
searchDocs.content: There are three ways to write specs that is compatible with the TestRunner class. For the assertions, use the Assert module.  Spec returns a function. Headless test.  return function() -- assertions... end   Spec returns the test's name and the function to run:  return { name = "Test", run = function() -- assertions end }   Spec returns test's name functions as different test steps:  return { name = "Test", steps = { function() -- assertions end, function() -- assertions end } }

searchDocs.title: TestRunner Example​
searchDocs.content: --- src/server/Tests/Tester.server.luau local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage") local RunService = game:GetService("RunService") local TestRunner = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.TestRunner) if RunService:IsStudio() then testRunner = TestRunner(script.Parent) testRunner:run() end
